rules_text:
When Tony Stark enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, create an Invention token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Scry 1.”)[/i]
At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more artifacts, transform Tony Stark.
rules_text2:
Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, create two Invention tokens.
Whenever Iron Man attacks, he deals damage equal to the number of artifacts you control to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
